section.title: number_printer.h
section.programlisting: 1 /* 2 * LUCID (Unified Computing Image and Data-Processing) is a program to process 3 * any type of data concurrently. 4 * Copyright (C) 2023 Lucas Hernández Abreu 5 * 6 * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify 7 * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by 8 * the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or 9 * (at your option) any later version. 10 * 11 * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, 12 * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of 13 * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the 14 * GNU General Public License for more details. 15 * 16 * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License 17 * along with this program. If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 18 * 19 * Author: Lucas Hernández Abreu 20 * Contact: lucas.hernandez.09@ull.edu.es 21 */ 22 32 #ifndef _NUMBERPRINTER_H 33 #define _NUMBERPRINTER_H 34 35 #include "../processing_unit_interface.h" 36 42 class NumberPrinter : public ProcessingUnitInterface { 43 public: 44 // Doesn't allocate anything 45 void Start(); 46 47 // Prints the number to the standard output 48 void Run(void *); 49 50 // Doesn't deallocate anything 51 void Delete(); 52 53 // Returns a pointer to a clone of NumberPrinter 54 ProcessingUnitInterface *Clone(); 55 }; 56 57 #endif
